nodes.text: The Red Yars system was a star system where the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing traveled to, in 5 ABY, after being attacked in the Ciaox Verith system by the New Republic refitted Star Destroyer and its starfighter wing. However, the Deliverance arrived in the Red Yars system, having followed a communications signal burst from the 204th's bulk freighter Yadeez, and found the Imperial fighter wing.

The refitted Star Destroyer and its starfighters attempted to engage the Imperial fighter wing, but only the New Republic pilots Chass na Chadic and Boyvech Toons were able to fire shots before the 204th jumped into hyperspace. The Deliverance and its starfighter wing then continued to chase the 204th across a number of other systems with the help of the comm bursts from the Yadeez.
The Red Yars system was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
